item.title: Building Abstractions using Functions
item.description: If you have completed yet another 3-hour-long tutorial video on a new programming language and are well aware of basic concepts like variables, loops, functions, and arrays, but don’t know what to do next, well, this article is for you. Let us begin with a wishful thinking. Don’t roll your eyes. Programming involves lots and lots of wishful thinkings. Assume that you’re an intern at a renowned company which specializes in numerical computation.
